text: Stemonaria is a genus of Amoebozoa in the family Stemonitidaceae. , there are 14 species in the genus. ==Species== *Stemonaria argentella *Stemonaria clausifila *Stemonaria fuscoides *Stemonaria gracilis *Stemonaria irregularis *Stemonaria laxa *Stemonaria laxiretis *Stemonaria longa *Stemonaria minuta *Stemonaria nannengae *Stemonaria pallidofila *Stemonaria pilosa *Stemonaria reticulospora *Stemonaria rufipes ==References== Category:Myxogastria Category:Amoebozoa genera
title: Stemonaria
